long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EZ Calculator is a sleek, user-friendly Chrome extension designed to offer quick mathematical solutions right at your fingertips. Whether you're balancing your budget, calculating percentages for a sale, or solving simple expressions, EZ Calculator provides accurate results in an instant. Its intuitive interface and keyboard shortcuts make number crunching a breeze, eliminating the need to open standalone calculator apps or websites. With EZ Calculator, mathematical simplicity is just a click away.

Pro tips:
- Press "C" to clear the display and start over
- Press "x" to copy the results from the display
- Press "backspace" or "delete" key to go back a step
